捲.definition: to roll up; to sweep up; to carry along; a roll; classifier for rolls, spools etc

捲入.definition: to be drawn into; to be involved in

捲層雲.definition: cirrostratus (cloud); also written 卷層雲|卷层云[juan3 ceng2 yun2]

捲心菜.definition: variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]

捲曲.definition: to curl (hair); to crimp; to roll up; curly

捲舌元音.definition: retroflex vowel (e.g. the final r of putonghua)

捲起.definition: to roll up; to curl up; (of dust etc) to swirl up

捲逃.definition: to bundle up valuables and abscond

捲邊.definition: to hem; hem; to curl (at the edge)

捲鋪蓋.definition: to roll up one's bedding; to pack one's things; (fig.) to quit; (fig.) to get fired; to get the sack

捲鋪蓋走人.definition: to pack one's things and leave

捲門.definition: rolling door; roll-up shutter (of a shopfront, garage, warehouse etc)

捲風.definition: see 龍捲風|龙卷风[long2 juan3 feng1]
